name: Treble Clef
description: Treble Clef is a game made during the Buffalo Game Space Game Jam 12 - make a game in 48 hours!  Theme for the jam was "Music is Key".  We wanted to make a platform game from the start and after several cool ideas we ended with the beginnings of a decent game with potential.  The game code was done entirely with Bolt Visual Scripting.  Continue to develop this game? Possibly?  Hard to say, I have other projects I would like to work on but this certainly has been a great learning tool.  I may continue it for that aspect alone.
